title: Liam Payne reveals that 'many girls' broke his heart but new girlfriend 'completely' has his back
text:
Liam Payne is talking heartbreak and love in a new interview.

The former One Direction bandmate sat down with MTV News for a candid chat ahead of the release of his first solo album in December.

After getting out of a very public relationship with star Cheryl Cole in 2018, the pop star is now dating 19-year-old model and Instagram personality Maya Henry.

Opening up: Liam Payne is talking heartbreak and love in a new interview with MTV News ahead of the released of his first solo album in December

'Honestly with love, I think you don't really understand it until it gives you that sting,' Liam said. 'It took a long time for me. Something really hurt me and it kind of made me appreciate love and people a lot more.'

The 26-year-old star filmed with MTV at the Repton Boxing Club in London and took fans on a tour of the impressive and funky wardrobe selection that he could choose from for the shoot.

As much fun as the locale and the clothes were, the conversation dipped a bit more seriously when it came to discussing love in the public eye.

'For the longest time, living such an exposed life made dating really hard,' Payne explained.

'Honestly with love, I think you don't really understand it until it gives you that sting,' Liam said. 'It took a long time for me.'

Candid: Liam talked to MTV about dating in the spotlight over the years and how he's changed his approach

'For the longest time, living such an exposed life made dating really hard,' Payne explained.

'I'm kind of at the place in my life now where I just realize it's not worth sacrificing my happiness just because somebody might see something. I don't have anything to hide, so I'm really happy right now and things are good.'

Last year Liam and Cheryl Cole called it quits after two years together. The former pair share a two-year-old son together.

Since their split, the former boybander struck up a romance with Maya Henry, who he called his best friend.

Moving on: After getting out of a very public relationship with star Cheryl Cole in 2018, the pop star is now dating 18-year-old model and Instagram personality Maya Henry (Pictured with Cole in 2016)

'I've found someone who's genuinely my best friend,' Liam gushed. 'She`s just so relaxed about everything and someone who`s completely got your back with everything is just the wildest thing.' (Pictured with his 19-year-old girlfriend Maya)

'I've found someone who's genuinely my best friend,' Liam gushed. 'She`s just so relaxed about everything and someone who`s completely got your back with everything is just the wildest thing.'

He continued: 'I don't think I've ever really experienced that before in someone so it's quite a wonder to watch actually.'

On the professional front, Payne is set to follow in the footsteps of other ex One Direction members with his debut solo album LP1 out December 6.

Much like his fans, when he was younger and dealing with the woes of heartbreak, the singer said he often turned to music.

'The perfect music go-to's for me were always Justin Timberlake's Justified, and 8701 by Usher.'

Adding with a laugh: 'I definitely spent a lot of time crying to that 8701 album over many different girls who broke my heart. Hashtag f**k you.'

More from Liam's shoot will hit MTVNews.com on Tuesday.
